articles.title: iPhone SE vs. iPhone 8 comparison: Which $400 iPhone should you get? - CNET
articles.description: Some retailers are still selling the iPhone 8 despite Apple discontinuing the device. But you should just get the new iPhone SE instead.
articles.content: In a bid to lure budget-minded iPhone fans, Apple debuted its new iPhone SE for 2020 for $399 (£419, AU$749). The new iPhone SE's specs and looks are similar to the iPhone 8 from three years ago, which is likely the reason why the tech company announced it wo… [+8360 chars]

articles.title: Free Xbox One Games With Gold For May 2020 Available Now - GameSpot
articles.description: Microsoft has revealed the four Xbox One games subscribers will be able to claim in May through Games With Gold, and it's another month of racing and sports games. You can grab the first two right now.
articles.content: With April winding down, it's almost time for a new batch of freebies for Xbox Live Gold and Game Pass Ultimate subscribers. Microsoft has revealed the four games--two Xbox One, two Xbox 360--you'll be able to snag in May 2020. Next month's Games with Gold of… [+1710 chars]

articles.title: Call Of Duty: Modern Warfare's Enormous Patch Size Annoys Players - GameSpot
articles.description: With another large update this week, Call of Duty: Modern Warfare's file size is approaching half that of standard console hard drives.
articles.content: Since launch, Call of Duty: Modern Warfare has been steadily growing in size thanks to its frequent, large updates. Following this week's latest patch and additional DLC content, the Modern Warfare file size now occupies close to 200GB on any given platform, … [+3298 chars]

articles.title: Dino Discovery Makes Animal Crossing: New Horizons' Spinosaurus Unrealistic - GameSpot
articles.description: Animal Crossing includes a lot of real scientific detail in its museum pieces, but dinosaurs can be tricky.
articles.content: Animal Crossing: New Horizons isn't an "edutainment" game, but your submissions to Blathers' museum do carry a lot of real educational value. Both in the owl curator's explanation and the museum placards, you can learn a lot of interesting details on the dona… [+1619 chars]
